definition: abbr. for 臺灣大學|台湾大学[Tai2 wan1 Da4 xue2]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Hi, I want to rent an apartment with one bedroom and one living room in the NTU area.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我想在臺大附近租間一房一廳的房子。

sentences.english: This is a super high rise building of integral functions, but most parts of it are used for residential apartments.
sentences.chinese: 雍景臺大廈是一棟以住宅爲主的超高層綜合性大廈。

sentences.english: The next time I buy a TV, I’m going to buy a large-screen one.
sentences.chinese: 下次買電視機的話，我要買臺大屏幕的。

sentences.english: We have a big TV set in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我們俱樂部有臺大電視機。

sentences.english: At the foot of the platform there are four bronze water vats, the ancient form of fire extinguishers.
sentences.chinese: 在山腳下有四個銅水平臺大缸，古代的形式，滅火器。

sentences.english: They spent 4450 yuan buying the big colour TV set.
sentences.chinese: 他們買那臺大彩電花了4450元。

sentences.english: The next time I buy a TV, I'm going to buy a large-screen one.
sentences.chinese: 下一次買電視的話，我要買臺大屏幕的。

definition: Chung Yuan Christian University, in Taiwan
National Taiwan University/abbr. to 臺大|台大[Tai2 Da4]
variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
Fu Jen Catholic University of Peking (from 1925), forerunner of Beijing Normal University 北京師範大學|北京师范大学/Fu Jen Catholic University in New Taipei City, Taiwan

pinyin: Guang3 zhou1 Mei3 shu4 Xue2 yuan4
Xi1 an1 Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2
